dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to continue to implement endangered fish recovery programs for the Upper Colorado and San Juan River Basins, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Upper Colorado and San Juan River Basins Recovery Act.

section.header: Extension of authorizations related to fish recovery programs
section.text: Section 3 of Public Law 106–392 (114 Stat. 1603 et seq.) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking 2023 each place it appears and inserting 2024;
in subsection (b)(1), by striking $179,000,000 and inserting $184,000,000;
in subsection (b)(2) by striking $30,000,000 and inserting $25,000,000;
in subsection (h), by striking , at least 1 year prior to such expiration,; and
in subsection (j), by striking 2021 each place it appears and inserting 2022.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives March 15, 2022.
